Package tud.iir.extraction.entity

Interface Summary
WrapperInductorInterface The WrapperInductorInterface class.
 

Class Summary
AffixWrapper A wrapper candidate is one prefix and one suffix with information about the maximum length.
AffixWrapperInductor Algorithm close to the one explained in "Language-Independent Set Expansion of Named Entities using the Web".
EntityDateComparator Sort entities by the date they were last searched.
EntityExtraction The EntityExtraction class stores entity extractions.
EntityExtractionProcess The EntityExtractionProcess is a thread that runs the entity extraction.
EntityExtractionStatus Save the status of the last entity extraction process in order to be able to continue later on.
EntityExtractionTechnique The abstract class for each entity extraction technique.
EntityExtractionThread  
EntityExtractor The main class for the entity extraction.
EntityQuery The entity specific query.
EntityQueryFactory The EntityQueryFactory creates EntityQuery objects.
EntityTrustComparator Sort entities by trust.
FocusedCrawlExtractor The FocusedCrawlExtractor technique.
ListDiscoverer The ListDiscoverer tries to find a list (with entities) on a web page.
Pattern A xPath pattern.
PhraseExtractor The PhraseExtraction technique.
PhraseWrapperInductor An inductor for phrases.
SeedExtractor The SeedExtractor technique.
WrapperInductor The abstract WrapperInductor class.
WrapperSet<W> A set of wrappers.
XPathAffixWrapper The XPathAffixWrapper class.
XPathWrapperInductor The XPathWrapperInductor class.
